name: Need for Speed of Light
description:
NFS of Light is a last man standing, multiplayer racing game played via each individual´s mobile phone as a controller. Players are light entities that have been sucked into a black hole and are attempting to survive the journey to the other side.

The tubular black hole is filled with hazards that each player must avoid. Players can also pick up light power-ups that allows them to charge up a shockwave pulse attack that pushes other players.

The team:

- Simen Fjellstad | Main Developer

- Jørgen Lund | Developer

- Rico Soleng | 3D and 2D assets + video content

- Sammuel Ambroise | 3D assets + intro video content.

- Mathieo Keith | Soundtrack
